item.title: laravel 部署
item.description: 看最近 laravel 好像蛮流行的，部署一个玩玩。 基础环境 composer $ curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php $ mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer 这个就是传说中的 php 的包管理器了，之前没怎么用过。 PEAR Download PEAR curl -O http://pear.php.net/go-pear.phar sudo php -d detect_unicode=0 go-pear.phar Configure and Install PEAR You should now be at a prompt to configure PEAR. Type 1 and press return . Enter: /usr/local/pear Type 4 and press return . Enter: /usr/local/bin Press return Verify PEAR You should be able to type:
